title: Leaving Academia
description:
In diesem Podcast interviewe ich in regelmäßigen Abständen Wissenschaftler*innen, die das Wissenschaftssystem verlassen haben. Der Podcast möchte Menschen sichtbar machen, die nach ihrer Karriere in der Wissenschaft wieder beruflich Fuß gefasst haben und mögliche berufliche Wege aufzeigen.

Wir sprechen über den Entscheidungsprozess, welche Schritte die Person gegangen ist, um festzustellen, wie sie ihre berufliche Zukunft gestalten möchte und wie der Bewerbungsprozess für sie war.

Suchst du nach Alternativen zur Wissenschaftskarriere? Ich coache Menschen, die die Wissenschaft verlassen wollen. Unter www.leavingacademia.de findest du weitere Informationen.

Wenn du auch einmal Lust hast, mit mir über deinen Weg aus der Wissenschaft zu reden, schreib mir eine Email an: info@leavingacademia.de

title: 2 Chicks & A Microphone
description:
This is our story how two chicks with a microphone became friends by being ACC rivals, Tigers or Noles, who's going to win?

Join us as we navigate our journey through our experiences in playing the Corporate America chess game, day to day emotions through relationships and life hacks. Come along with us through the wild ride we call life.

title: Byte-Sized Law
description: Byte-Sized Law is a captivating podcast that delves into the intersection of law and technology, exploring the transformative impact of technology on the legal industry. Hosted by Siddarth Menon a legal operations specialist and technology enthusiast, the podcast focuses on interviewing industry experts to uncover the latest trends, innovations, and challenges in the legal tech landscape.

title: Her Story Matters
description:
Ready to unlock the juiciest, most empowering stories ever? Welcome to "Her Story Matters" (formerly LeadershipRx Podcast) with your bold and brilliant host, MBA Nurse, Ashley Allen!

Get strapped in because we're about to blow the roof off with unfiltered and uncensored tales of women who redefine the game. From smashing stereotypes to raising the bar, these fierce females will leave you in awe.

Step behind the curtain with us as we dive deep into the lives of trailblazing entrepreneurs, visionaries, and change-makers who conquer challenges with style and grace. No holding back, no sugarcoating – just raw, real stories from phenomenal women who are making waves!

Each episode is a rollercoaster ride of resilience, wit, and audacity – the kind of fuel that ignites your fire and unleashes your inner boss babe.

Whether you're a go-getter ready to seize the world or an ally supporting women's power, "Her Story Matters" is the high-octane podcast you can't afford to miss. Tune in and brace yourself for mind-blowing interviews, electrifying moments, and a whole lot of empowerment.

Get ready to join the revolution of trailblazers who won't be silenced. Say goodbye to the status quo and hello to a new era where women's voices shatter glass ceilings and make history.

Don't wait – hit that subscribe button now and ride the waves of "Her Story Matters" with MBA Nurse, Ashley Allen. It's time for her story to take center stage!

title: persist for passion
description: A podcast conducted by a Bangladeshi teenager aspiring to de-stigmatize the concept of non-STEM career fields in the South Asian community. Stories, honesty, and advice are featured through experienced South Asian panelists in this safe space to help current students follow their passions in life, Auntie-approved or not.

title: A Cast of Entrepreneurs
description:
Hello and welcome to A Cast of Entrepreneurs, brought to you by the Entrepreneurs’ Forum.

 

I’m Elaine Stroud, Chief Executive of the Entrepreneurs’ Forum, and together with Sally Cowling, our Head of Marketing, we’ve been talking to entrepreneurs from all over the North East about what it’s really like to be an entrepreneur. We’re getting the real insight into their lives and businesses. 

 

This series brings together a cast of 36 North East entrepreneurs. So fasten your seatbelt as we’re going on a roller coaster ride from basketball to crafting, from excavation to Atlantic rowing, from selling darts in the playground to 70th birthday celebrations. 

 

Join us as we talk to our resident entrepreneur of the year, Mike O’Brien from Opencast; Sara Davies MBE, crafting queen and TV dragon; Tim Wilks, owner of Lane 7, one of the Sunday Times fastest growing UK companies; and the youthful passion of startup entrepreneur Rosie Bath and her sustainable business Cera Cotton. 

 

These are conversations to inspire you and to energise you. Enjoy listening!

Get involved with The Entrepreneurs’ Forum: https://entrepreneursforum.net/

title: Behind The Scenes With Darren Roy
description: Go Behind The Scenes with Darren Roy as he interviews interesting and influential people across New Hampshire and beyond!
author_name: Behind The Scenes With Darren Roy

title: BOSS
description:
BOSS is Ali Levitan's executive interview series on LinkedIn that is now a top rated Podcast. Learn, network, and pay it forward with stories from the Head of Global Partnerships at TikTok, Head of Sales at NBCU, CMO at CVS Health, CEO at Dress for Success, CMO at JPMorgan, Chief Sustainability Officer at Verizon, Head of Global Learning at Bloomberg, and more.

Ali, a seasoned media, tech, and startup executive, has been featured by Fortune Magazine, The New York Times, Bloomberg, TFQ, CES, Cynopsis Media, AWS Podcast, The Federal Reserve, Wharton Magazine and more.

The BOSS audience ranges from executives to people looking for new career opportunities to students looking for inspiration. BOSS stories and access to a wide variety of seasoned leaders and founders is what Ali wished she had when she was in college. Ali is now in her 40s with 2 kids (Jake and Sophia) and still looking to her BOSS network and these clips for daily inspiration and gems of wisdom.

title: Taustajõud
description:
Mina olen Deivi Tall ning igas saates teen ma juttu inimestega, kelle töö ei jää märkamata, kuid kelle nimi on näha vaid lõputiitrites - Nad on taustajõud staaridele, poliitikutele, sportlastele ja teistele silmapaistvatele inimestele.

Olen kindel, et peale igat episoodi kuulamist on sinul, hea kuulaja, veel rohkem motivatsiooni ja indu oma elutee ägedamaks muuta, tööalased sihid paika saada ja unistuste poole püüelda.

Taustajõu episood ilmub kaks korda kuus, teisipäeviti.

Pane follow ja insipratsiooni valang on garanteeritud!

title: AjourTalk
description:
Velkommen til AjourTalk, den ultimative podcast om virksomheders rejse, succes og udfordringer. Vi er dine værter, Mathias og Niclas.

På AjourTalk dykker vi ned i de mest inspirerende historier om virksomheder og deres rejse til succes. Vi udforsker de afgørende øjeblikke, der har formet dem, og lader vores gæster dele deres erfaringer og indsigter.

Kender du en virksomhed som er spændende at få med i studiet?

Så skriv en mail til Ngl@ajournordic.com og skriv podcast i emnefeltet.

Uanset om det er en startup, der har overvundet enorme odds for at opnå succes, eller en etableret virksomhed, der har håndteret kriser og forandringer, finder vi ud af, hvordan de er kommet dertil, hvor de er i dag.

Vores mål er at inspirere og lære af disse historier. Vi ønsker at give dig indsigt og værktøjer til din egen rejse som iværksætter eller virksomhedsleder.

Så sæt dig til rette, og vær med os på AjourTalk, hvor vi deler dybdegående interviews, vigtige lektioner og masser af inspiration fra nogle af erhvervslivets mest bemærkelsesværdige personer.

Følg med, og lad os sammen udforske virksomheders rejse mod succes.

title: Colin Does Electric
description: A weekly podcast brought to you by a second career 4th year electrical apprentice. I'll be discussing work, tools and more!

title: Aeres Agree - de toekomst van groen talent
description:
Wat zijn de laatste ontwikkelingen en oplossingen voor relevante HR-thema’s en wervingsuitdagingen als het gaat om de toekomst van groen talent? Om deze vraag te beantwoorden heeft Aeres Agree vier podcastafleveringen opgenomen waarbij in iedere aflevering ingegaan wordt op een actuele HR thema. In de komende periode zullen wij iedere twee weken een nieuwe aflevingen live zetten.

De vragen die wij centraal zetten bij iedere aflevering:

• Wat betekent de verduurzamingsagenda voor de medewerkers van nu en de toekomst?

• Is de krappe arbeidsmarkt een probleem of een kans?

• Hoe ondersteunt je employer brand bij het vinden van het juiste talent?

• Waar letten talenten op bij het kiezen van een baan?

title: Talking to the Top
description:
Talking to the Top is the podcast made by students for students where we encourage thought about the future, discover the opportunities that lie ahead of us all, and perhaps most importantly, chat to extremely successful individuals as they uncover the steps to success and share their journeys through education and into the working world. Throughout these episodes, we will give you an insight into the lives and minds of incredibly successful people in their respective fields, allowing you to learn more about the world that lies ahead of us all and, most importantly, how our brilliant guests got to where they are today.

The show wouldn't be possible without the help of those mentioned below:

Host and Producer - Edward Brooke

Co-host - Freddie Fineman

Editors - James Crawford and Freddie Fineman

Music - Daniel Marks

title: Expat Dispatch
description:
Welcome to Expat Dispatch: your gateway podcast to foreigners’ life in the Netherlands!

Our small team (Sergei, Dmitry, and Tina) are here to share with you a bunch of pleasant and valuable stories, focusing on early/mid-career professionals and recent graduates. We deeply value the significance of peoples’ voices and their social security, especially while navigating the turmoil of life in a new country. At Expat Dispatch, we firmly believe that through storytelling, we can ignite inspiration and empower our listeners to pursue their dreams and make a profound impact on the world, likewise - learning from the mistakes of others.

One of our main objectives is to foster connections among talented people, providing them with a supportive environment where they feel valued, acknowledged, and uplifted. We are not limited to the career aspects as the process of moving and adapting to a new country is definitely not only about work but also includes crucial cultural and societal shifts.

No matter if you're taking your first steps in your professional journey or seeking a transformative life shift, already moved to the Netherlands or just considering that opportunity, our podcast is dedicated to telling you all sides of the expat’s life in the Netherlands.

Join us as we share diverse stories, fostering motivation and igniting a sense of belonging. We'll create a vibrant community where individuals come together to learn, grow, and thrive. Let us be your trusted companion on the expats’ path in the Netherlands.
author_name: Sergei Kabatskii, Tina Bainakova, Dmitry Trubetskoy

title: Let's talk Tech
description:
Tech podcast with industry experts.

Core topics are Lithium-ion battery industry, EV technologies, Electrification of commercial vehicles, & Career talks.

title: Wervingspraat bij de koffieautomaat
description: In onze podcastserie "Wervingspraat bij de koffieautomaat'' bespreken experts ontwikkelingen in werving en selectie. Zo blijf je als werkgever op de hoogte in deze veranderende wereld van werk.

title: Workforce 4.0
description:
Workforce 4.0 is an industry centric podcast featuring Manufacturing Executives from all industries coming together to emphasize how companies are partnering with technology to give people more meaningful work. As a passion project created by Ann Wyatt, Workforce 4.0 highlights crucial topics such as closing the talent gap, success stories of real people engaged with the latest manufacturing technology and how the manufacturing workforce can transition into these exciting new roles.

Meet Your Host:

Ann's passion is helping innovative and progressive industrial Small-Medium Enterprises and Solutions Providers in accessing top leading technical talent within an increasingly decentralized market. Achieving this goal relies on blending emerging digital capabilities with a highly personable customer user experience, resulting in bridging the talent gap and building stronger company cultures and communities. In her personal time, she advocates for:

  • Creative Workforce Development Initiatives

  • Technical and Interpersonal Skillsets Facing the Future of Work

  • Continuous Improvement of Company Culture

  • Advancement of All Things Industry 4.0

Learn More About Host Ann Wyatt

Watch Workforce 4.0 on YouTube

title: StreamerGenics What's it Like?
description: Being a streamer helped me connect and meet so many different people a crossed the world and in so many ways. I want others to share their experiences in life with my audience to enlighten those who may not know "What it's Like." Our guests will be people from everyday life and they may tell our listeners things that might give you pause! Or maybe you might even relate! Come join the show and get connected with us at StreamerGenics!

title: ‘k werk gelukkig bij Amarant
description:
Benieuwd naar jouw mogelijkheden binnen Amarant? Dan zit je hier goed! In deze podcast geven we jou een inkijkje in de verschillende functies van Amarant. Dus ben je al werkzaam bij Amarant en benieuwd naar jouw loopbaanmogelijkheden óf ben je (nog) niet werkzaam bij ons en wil je graag weten hoe het is om bij ons te werken? Luister en leer. Veel plezier! En heb je vragen of opmerkingen, mail ons dan gerust: loopbaanadvies@amarant.nl

Wil je meer weten over Amarant als werkgever, kijk dan ook op: www.werkenbijamarant.nl

title: On The Bridge
description:
Welcome to The Bridge Event Academy podcast, On The Bridge. Join us as we bring you insightful conversations with industry experts, influencers, and friends sharing their tips and tricks on successful event planning. Our podcast is centered around the event industry but we also extend beyond it, providing a platform for fun and engaging discussions on a variety of topics.

We believe in laughing and learning and that’s why each episode is designed to not only educate you, but also entertain you. Our guests come from different backgrounds and experiences, providing diverse perspectives on the industry. They will share their journey, the challenges they’ve encountered, and how they overcame them to achieve success.

Gather round, event planners, entrepreneurs, and interested listeners alike, for meaningful conversations that inspire and propel you toward your event planning goals. Join us on On the Bridge Don’t forget to subscribe to never miss an episode!

title: Leadership Lounge
description: Is there a through line as to what makes a leader? Hosted by Zack Marvel, a lifelong entrepreneur, and chronically curious person, The Leadership Lounge Podcast was born out of a desire to hear about the person behind the professional. title: Tech Immigration News
description:
The Canadian job market has long been influenced by the global workforce, driven by various factors such as immigration, technological innovation, international labour mobility, and business globalization. Canada's strong economy, high living standards, and multicultural society have made it an attractive destination for foreign workers for decades.

This influx of global talent has significantly shaped the country's diverse and dynamic labour market, filling gaps in key sectors like healthcare, technology, engineering, and education.

Canada's immigration policy has proactively invited skilled labour to supplement its workforce, and the Express Entry system has fast-tracked the process for skilled workers, positively impacting local economies. This symbiotic relationship benefits the country's economic growth and foreign nationals seeking opportunities.

title: Invaluable: Achieving Clarity on Value
description:
This Podcast is a companion to the book Invaluable: Achieving Clarity on Value, available on Amazon. Join author Somik Raha in conversation with Julius St. Clair on each chapter of the book.

Book Abstract:

In today’s complex world, it can be difficult to make decisions that align with our values. Invaluable fills an important gap in decision-making: of achieving clarity on our values and integrating them into our decisions consciously. You, dear reader, already have unique values waiting to be unpacked and articulated across diverse work contexts. Invaluable offers a holistic framework to aid its discovery, testing and succinct communication. This homage to values is brought out through stories, philosophy, poetry, citizen science and embedded podcasts. By the end of this book, you will have a deeper understanding of your singular values blueprint, making intentional decision-making an enriching process. You will also be inspired to live a life that is true to your values.

title: Future-Proofing Your Career and Business in the Age of AI and ChatGPT
description:
Are you concerned about the impact of AI on your job security? Join our 2-hour webinar, learn the basics of ChatGPT and introduction to other AI tools, and learn how to future-proof your career!

Future-Proofing Your Career in the Age of AI and ChatGPT

T﻿he Problem:

  • AI technologies like ChatGPT continue to advance, they're reshaping the work landscape, bringing both exciting possibilities and major challenges.

  • A significant pain point is the threat of massive job losses. As machines get smarter and more capable, they could potentially take over human tasks and roles.

  • Automation is predicted to cause an alarming rise in job losses. A 2022 study by the McKinsey Global Institute forecasts a mind-boggling 800 million jobs could disappear by 2030.

  • As a result, many people face uncertainty and fear about their job security and future career prospects.

  • The rapid pace of AI development could leave those with outdated skills behind, further escalating the issue of job losses.

  • Therefore, learning how to future-proof your career in the age of AI and ChatGPT is not just a wise move, but a necessity to survive and thrive in the future job market.

  • Don’t miss this opportunity to master Al. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting out, our 2 hours Masterclass will teach you the knowledge and skills you need to succeed in the changing world of Al.

for more information please visit: https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/future-proofing-your-career-and-business-in-the-age-of-ai-and-chatgpt-tickets-654711177757

description:
Welcome to Nurse Boss Diaries, the podcast hosted by Teresita, a nurse leader and passionate advocate for empowering nursing professionals. Nurse Boss Diaries is your go-to source for a wide range of topics that encompass everything from empowering and educational discussions to entertaining and inspiring stories.

Teresita brings a wealth of experience and expertise to the podcast. She has firsthand knowledge of the challenges and triumphs that nurses face in their careers. Her genuine passion for uplifting her fellow nurses shines through in every episode.

From CEOs of healthcare companies to award-winning nurse practitioners, Nurse Boss Diaries has featured a wide range of guests who share their unique perspectives on leadership, entrepreneurship, and personal growth. Each episode offers valuable insights, practical strategies, and inspiring stories that will resonate with nurses at all stages of their careers.

Nurse Boss Diaries covers empowering topics such as leadership development, career advancement, and cultivating a resilient mindset. Nurse Boss Diaries invites industry experts and successful nurse entrepreneurs to share their experiences, providing listeners with practical advice and strategies for success.

In addition to empowering discussions, Nurse Boss Diaries also features entertaining and inspiring stories that highlight the unique journeys of nurses who have achieved remarkable feats or overcome extraordinary challenges. These stories serve as a source of inspiration and motivation for nurses seeking to make a difference in their own lives and careers.

Moreover, Teresita recognizes the importance of work-life balance and self-care. Nurse Boss Diaries occasionally delves into topics such as stress management, mindfulness, and achieving overall well-being. Teresita understands that nurturing oneself is crucial for nurses to thrive personally and professionally.

As the host of Nurse Boss Diaries, Teresita creates a welcoming and engaging atmosphere that encourages open dialogue and fosters a sense of community among nursing professionals. She invites listeners to participate in the conversation through social media platforms, where they can share their own stories, ask questions, and connect with like-minded individuals.

So, whether you're a nurse seeking guidance on career advancement, an aspiring entrepreneur looking to start your healthcare venture, or simply someone who enjoys empowering and entertaining content, Nurse Boss Diaries with host Teresita is the perfect podcast for you. Tune in to be inspired, informed, and entertained as we discuss topics that range from empowering to entertaining and everything in between.

title: Bouw aan de toekomst
description:
Ik Bouw Zo biedt jongvolwassenen de kans om in te stromen in de bouwsector met uitzicht op een vaste baan. Deelnemers krijgen een opleiding en een werkplek bij een erkend leerbedrijf. Om uitval tijdens de opleiding te voorkomen, wordt er intensieve begeleiding geboden. We gaan in gesprek met jongeren over hun ervaring met betrekking tot de bouw, de begeleiding, de kansen en de aandachtspunten.

De doelgroep zijn jongvolwassenen in de leeftijd van 16 t/m 30 jaar, die minder aansluiting ervaren met de arbeidsmarkt en behoefte hebben aan gelijke kansen en persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Deze jongeren vallen vaak tussen wal en schip en hebben nog geen werk gevonden. Hun talenten zijn nog niet direct zichtbaar en ze zijn zoekende.

Join us as we explore what entrepreneurship has meant, its current significance, and its potential future in our fast-changing global landscape.

In each episode, we dive into hot topics like AI's impact on entrepreneurs and timeless themes like mental health in entrepreneurship. We also dig into ethics and the creative spirit driving it all.

Our guests, hailing from both international and Canadian backgrounds, bring their expertise and stories to the table, sharing diverse perspectives that shape the entrepreneurial conversation.

We explore topics such as effective facilitation, team dynamics, agile coaching, continuous improvement, and much more. You'll hear from experienced Scrum Masters, Agile coaches, and thought leaders who will share their valuable experiences and strategies to help you succeed.

Whether you're seeking to enhance your Scrum knowledge, refine your coaching skills, or navigate the ever-evolving Agile landscape, the Scrumbuddies Podcast has got you covered. Tune in, engage with our community, and embark on a journey of growth and mastery in the world of Scrum.
